description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Tired of zombies?  Try cyberpunk instead.  Enter a world run by corporations that hire cyberrunners known as Deckers to hack systems.  The matrix, however, is filled with intrusion countermeasures (ICE) that can kill if you aren't careful.  This game is brought to you by LoneWolf Studios.
description.short: Tired of zombies?  Try cyberpunk instead.  Enter a world run by corporations that hire cyberrunners known as Deckers to hack systems.  The matrix, however, is filled with intrusion countermeasures (ICE) that can kill if you aren't careful.  This game is brought to you by LoneWolf Studios.
